text: @ScrambledAdams "In time, of course, all this nature, but I'm not sure I've got any work for you, though," said Susan brusquely, "don't you mean last legs?"

passages.full_quote: <used>In time, of course, M</used>r. Knightley would be forgotten, that is, supplanted; but this could not be expected to happen very early

passages.full_quote: That, <used>of course, all this nature, but I'm</used> afraid he's right, you know, down in the hold

passages.full_quote: "I've got a new commission, <used>but I'm not sure I've got any work for you, though," said Susan</used>, still gulping air
